text:
iOS 19 will reportedly introduce the biggest design change since iOS 7

Source: @markgurman
Full story: https://bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-03-10/apple-readies-dramatic-design-overhauls-for-ios-19-ipados-19-and-macos-16…
people say this every year
VisionOS inspired UI?
Hmm... Hopefully it'll be a bigger redesign than iOS 18!!!

If we're being Honest.,

A visual refresh of iOS has been needed for several years. Unfortunately in 2025, Apple is more known for software delays than actual updates.
Hope they redesign the battery percentage so it actually lasts longer!
And let me guess, they will introduce the best iPhone ever this fall.
I am not ready for this
What’s that? A new background colour or icon set?
iOS 7 felt like stepping into the future. iOS 19 might just redefine it. Let’s see if Apple still has that magic

Ok this is very exciting, and much anticipated. 

So I know this might be unpopular, but I am not a fan of "circular" icons for iOS or macOS, not really sure how they will play out on a 2D surface.

Other than that I am excited to see where they will go with this.

Embarrassing

@Apple My iOS 19 wishlist: 
- Ability to move cursor in calculator app.
- More intuitive interface for reply-chains in messages.  
- Separate volume sliders for ringer and media.
- Keyboard option to type superscripts and subscripts, along with more symbols like pi and alpha.
